verbose_text: In L. infantum, Li-BH3AQP, which is mainly perinuclear, has a pro death activity dependent on key residues of the BH3 domain, reducing cell viability and inducing DNA fragmentation after the addition of pro apoptotic stimuli such as staurosporine and antimycin A [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Li-BH3AQP, which is mainly perinuclear, has a pro-death activity dependent on key residues of the BH3 domain, reducing cell viability
